create long long integers n , x , y , i , j , x1 , x2 , x3 , x4
lines.code: long long int n , x , y , i , j , x1 , x2 , x3 , x4 ;

lines.text: create long long integer z with z = 0
read n
create long long integer arrays a , b , with a size n , b size n
lines.code: long long int a [ n ] , b [ n ] ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to n exclusive , read a [ i ] read b [ i ]
lines.code: for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { cin >> a [ i ] >> b [ i ] ; }

lines.text: for i = 0 to n exclusive
set x to a [ i ] , set y to b [ i ]
lines.code: x = a [ i ] , y = b [ i ] ;

lines.text: set x1 to 0 , set x2 to 0 , set x3 to 0 , set x4 to 0
for j = 0 to n exclusive
if i is not j
if a [ j ] is greater than x and b [ j ] is y , increment x1
if a [ j ] is less than x and b [ j ] is y , increment x2
if a [ j ] is x and b [ j ] is less than y , increment x3
if a [ j ] is x and b [ j ] is greater than y , increment x4
